thag5.3:1.1_0: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:1.2_0: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind:
thag5.3:1.4_0: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:2.1_0: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
thag5.3:2.2_0: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind:
thag5.3:2.3_0: I meditate there, my mind at peace:
thag5.3:2.4_0: so rain, sky, if you wish.
thag5.3:3.4_0: I meditate there, free of lust:
thag5.3:4.4_0: I meditate there, free of hate:
thag5.3:5.4_0: I meditate there, free of delusion:
thag5.3:5.5_0: so rain, sky, if you wish.
